12.Fiber optic communication 
13.apecial Topics

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1.微算機概論，2.中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3.微算機指令集及定址模式，4.組合語言程式設計，5.硬體介面概論，6.記憶體介面(ROM及RAM)介面，7.輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8.微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en:
1.Introduction to microcomputer
2.Central processor unit 
3.Microprogramming set
4.Assemblylanguage programming
5.Interfacing circuits
6.ROM/RAM interface
7.I/O operations
8.Interrupt and direct memory access

name.zh: 國際觀培養-全球化企業經營策略
name.en: Feast for the global perspective —Business Strategies of Global Enterprises

description.zh: 本課程藉由台灣企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以台灣企業品牌之實際案例，能讓台灣企業與年輕學子能由認識自己所屬國家的奮鬥過程，才能更進一步的追求國際觀，追求更廣闊的國際視野。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real examples, business manager will make students learn further about the Taiwan brand and innovation and creation thinking. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 四管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創新講座-產品與服務創新策略
name.en: Innovation Lecture - product and service innovation strategy

description.zh: N
description.en: N

notes: 四設三、創新所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創意與創新管理事業化
name.en: How to implement innovation into realized enterprise

description.zh: 在許多場合，無論是研討會、交流會等均會有許多創意點子出現，但多數的點子有如雨水一般，如果不能蓄存，散落後就消失；反之如果有系統收集，它就成為企業創新的主要來源，而透過企業創新的多元面向，如產品創新、流程創新、行銷創新等，均可為企業帶來附加價值，提升競爭力。本課程主要內容有產品創新、流程創新、經營模式創新、行銷創新、識別系統創新、組織創新、新事業創新、創意與創新管理事業化等，有助於學生將創意和創業事業化。
description.en: In many seminar and mutual discussion cases, there are many good ideas happened. But innovation like rain fall, if we don't have reservoir to keep it, It will rain everywhere and disappeared. If we have data base to collect all the innovation, It will to be value material in enterprise innovation. Through product innovation, process innovation and marketing innovation, It will bring high value to enterprise and rises its competing ability. From "How to establish an enterprise" classes, We find many students have many good ideas, If we can give them more advanced knowledge to use such ideas, It will benefit them success in establish an enterprise.

notes: 四管三與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創業講座-網路創新服務

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en:
Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor?
There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

notes: 四管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

name.en: Practice of Yarn and Fabric Formation

description.zh: 實際了解和操作短纖維及長纖維的主要紡紗與織布製程。對相關工廠的流程設計和產品企劃也應一併予以知悉。
description.en: To understand the process technology of yarn and fabric formation in detail. The plant design and the product planning are also evaluated.

name.zh: 國際觀培養講座─東協商務、文化
name.en: Development of global perspective: the series of ASEAN Community

description.zh: 東南亞地區向來為台灣的重要經貿夥伴，而東協十國已決定於2015年效法歐盟成立經濟共同體(ASEAN Community)，並積極尋求與日本、中國、南韓、印度、澳洲與紐西蘭等六國，簽署雙邊自由貿易協定，希望未來能建立一個30億人口、年經濟產值達九兆美元的「東亞自由貿易區」。希望藉由此次課程，讓學生瞭解東協成立後，臺灣的未來產業與市場發展，充實學生未來就業所需知識與技能。並藉由東南亞文化講座，開啟學生的國際視野，鼓勵學生實際透過度假打工、遊學、自助旅行、公益旅行、壯遊體驗等方式赴海外體驗學習，使其得以在經濟不景氣的時代下擴展未來的就業版圖。
description.en: Southeast Asia has been the most important economic and trading partner with Taiwan. Association of Southeast Asian Nations decided to found ASEAN Community in 2015, which takes European Union as a model. At the same time, it is vigorously looking for signing the Bilateral Free Trade Agreement with Japan, China, South Korea, India, Australia and New Zealand for the purpose of establishing an East Asia Free Trade Zone which accounts for the population of 3 billion of people and 9 trillion of GDP. We hope that we can make students learn more about this rising market after the establishment of ASEAN Free Trade Area (AFTA) by introducing them various aspects of Southeast Asia, including its cultures by means of taking part in a working holiday, a study abroad program, a backpacking tour, voluntourism, or a Grand Tour. After this class, students are expected to learn about new employment opportunities in this era of recession and high unemployment rate.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

notes: 博雅核心-法治,限外籍生修讀

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

notes: 博雅核心-文學,限外籍生修讀

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至資訊相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at a computer science (information engineering) related company or research organizations for 18 weeks(20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

notes: 部份時間(2.5天/週)，加選前須先完成廠商媒合簽約

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至資訊相關機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at a computer science (information engineering) related company or research organizations for full-time at least 4.5 months. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

notes: 全時間課程，學生加選前須先完成實習廠商媒合簽約

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
description.en: Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course focuses on three major areas: 1.The environment of global markets and cross-cultural comparison.2.Assessment of global market opportunities and threats.3.Development and implementation of global marketing strategies.

description.zh: 1.基本CMOS邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS基本邏輯閘佈局，4.數位電路功能分析與模擬，5.階層式的電路組成，6.中小型電路設計，7.VHDL系統，8.認識Cadence系統，9.圖形編輯設備的操作練習，10.零件庫介紹，11.設計電路之輸入編輯，12.電路模擬實習，13.數位電路的晶片設計，14. 電路自動化設計15.晶片製造專題。
description.en: 1.Basic CMOS logic design 2.CMOS logic gate simulation 3.CMOS logic gate placement 4.Analysis and simulation of digital circuit 5.Hierachy circuit 6.VHDL system 7.Introduction to c cadence system 8.Graphic editor practice 9.module 10.Input editor 11.Circuit simulation practice 12. Electronic Design Automation 13.Special projects.

description.zh: 1.基本CMOS邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS基本邏輯閘佈局，4.數位電路功能分析與模擬，5.階層式的電路組成，6.中小型電路設計，7.VHDL系統，8.認識Cadence系統，9.圖形編輯設備的操作練習，10.零件庫介紹，11.設計電路之輸入編輯，12.電路模擬實習，13.數位電路的晶片設計，14. 電路自動化設計15.晶片製造專題。
description.en: 1.Basic CMOS logic design 2.CMOS logic gate simulation 3.CMOS logic gate placement 4.Analysis and simulation of digital circuit 5.Hierachy circuit 6.VHDL system 7.Introduction to c cadence system 8.Graphic editor practice 9.module 10.Input editor 11.Circuit simulation practice 12. Electronic Design Automation 13.Special projects.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科學之概念介紹，本課程包括光的特性、固態物理概念、光的調變、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊系統。
description.en: The course of Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering introduces the concepts of the science of electro-optics. It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

notes: 四光二和四電資二合開

description.zh:
1.集合,序列與函數
2.基礎邏輯
3.關聯式
4.計數（排列,組合）
5.圖與樹（基礎圖論）
6.遞迴式與演算法
7.有向圖
description.en:
1.Sets Sequences and Function
2.Elementary Logic
3.Relations
4.Counting
5.Graph and Tree
6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms
7.Digraphs

description.zh:
1.通訊工程簡介
2.調幅與調頻
3.傳輸與接收系統
4.衛星通訊簡介
5.數據通訊簡介
6.光纖通訊簡介
7.電話系統簡介
8.行動通訊簡介
description.en:
1.Introductions
2.Amplitude and Frequency Modulations
3.Radio Transmitters and Receivers
4.Introduction to Satellite Communications
5.Introduction to Data Communications
6.Introduction to Fiber-Optic Communications
7.Introduction to Telephone System
8.Introduction to Cellular System

description.zh:
講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD
繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確
表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 讓學生習得3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

description.zh:
從人類、社會、人文學上探討人性、設計倫理與資源、經濟之關係，
建立設計之推行及正確理念。
description.en: Lecture on the development of prime influences on design domestically and internationally, with emphasis on the work of key industrial designers. Discussion sessions with reading assignments will be carried out through the course, and submission of a written report is required.

description.zh: 本課程著重實務性訓練Pro/ENGINEER系統之操作能力，輔以幾何模型學理論說明CAD技術的發展現況。首先介紹CAD概論，說明電腦輔助設計技術的趨勢，培養學生具備現代數位產品開發概念與同步工程之意義；然後教授Pro/ENGINEER系統的各部分功能、指令操作，並以設計專題引導學生建立實務應用，強化學生的操作與應用能力。
description.en: Introduction of the fundamental of 3D CAD technology and the manipulation of the software packages, Pro/ENGINEER, for product design in a concurrent engineering environment. By the practical projects, the students are trained more adept skill and application experience.

notes: 產品組,限25人,四設二三合開

name.zh: 室內設計與裝修證照概論
name.en: License of Interior Design and Decoration

description.zh: 整合學科與術科兩大部分，本課程介紹【建築物室內設計】與【建築物室內裝修工程管理】專業技能檢定事宜。參酌最新專業議題並研習歷屆考試題庫，課程加強學／術科模擬考試訓練，期使學校養成教育與設計界之專業需求得以結合。
description.en: Integrating the Knowledge and Technology parts of the Interior design profession, the course introduces the practice of National Skill Test of Interior design and Project Management. Concerning not just the updated ideas and the historical questions, it stresses also the intensive stimulated test so as to link the educational achievement and the professional expectation.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs. Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs. The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 四設四、創新所與最後一哩合開,限大四及研究所選修

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 文化人類學是研究人類文化的科學，包括：文化的理論與研究方法，文化的起源與發展，人類的社會組織與制度，人類的物質生活，人類的宗教信仰，人類的藝術，以及人類的社會文化變遷。
description.en: Cultural anthropology is a region for studying the culture of human. The course included cultural theory, research method, the origin and development of culture, social organization, religion, arts, and cultural change.

name.zh: 財經專業證照實務講座
name.en: Practice Seminar of Finance and Economic Professional Certification

description.zh: 為加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本財經專業證照實務講座，針對金融市場常識與職業道德、普通證券商業務員、理財規劃人員等專業證照開設輔導課程，希望學生能夠學習基本的金融市場常識與金融從業人員應具備的職業道德，並進一步瞭解理財的流程，同時就個人或家庭的收支、儲蓄、住屋、子女教育、以及退休生活等規劃皆予明確分析，並舉實際案例詳予說明並闡釋各種相關理財金融機構之角色與功能，逐一介紹各類理財工具之特性及其有效之運用方法。對於未來有志從事金融機構財富管理業務之從業人員及大學校院相關系所學生，極適合作為其日常業務之參考、進修或準備應試之用。俾培育學生參加並通過國內外財經專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of professional licenses in finance and economics, nurture students to participate in professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate finance and economics professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

notes: 四管三與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討供應鏈管理相關之基本議題。供應鏈管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，對整個製造與配銷通路的整合性管理策略。本課程內容包含供應鏈管理之策略發展、供應鏈管理之相關功能、及供應鏈管理之主要困難點。本課程將同時探討與供應鏈管理相關之議題，如存貨理論、資訊系統整合、及供應契約等。本課程理論與實務並重、案例研討也將為本課程重要之一環。
description.en: This course intends to introduce fundamental issues regarding supply chain management. Supply chain management is an integrated approach to manage the total flow of manufacturing and distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The contents of this course include the development of supply chain management strategies, supply chain management functions, and major challenges of supply chain management. Certain topics related to supply chain management, such as inventory policy, information system integration, and supply contract will also be addresses. This course focuses on both theoretical and practical issues. Real world case study will be an important part of this course.

name.en: Clinical Application of Medical Electronic Device

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為使學生以電子學的知識，應用在生物醫學的臨床領域。本課程將介紹生理測量的應用電路，由電路的實現使學生更能感受到生醫電子的實際應用範疇。包含生醫感測器、生醫電子放大器、血壓和心血管診斷儀器。本課程主要著重在觀念的溝通與臨床之應用，使學生能學習與扮演電子工程與臨床醫學之橋樑角色。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with electronics knowledge, to help the clinical application in the biomedical field. This course will introduce the medical electronic systems and electronic circuit theory, and then introduce the application of physiological measurement circuit. Mainly on medical equipment and application of technical principles, which includes  biomedical sensors, electrodes and transducers, biomedical electronic amplifier, blood pressure and cardiovascular diagnostic equipment. The students can learn and play a role of bridge between electrical engineering and clinical medicine.

notes: 四子四、四子三及電通所合開

description.zh: 課程目標旨在提供學生未來就業的準備。透過業界主管分享職前準備與面試技巧，及職場須知與職涯規劃讓學生做好進入職場前的心理準備。
description.en: This course is aiming for student's career development. The invited industrial experts share their experience in recruitment and how they evaluate the potential employees. The completion of the sequential class helps student to know the tips in workplace, and also adjust students' for future career challenge.

notes: (四)ABC上課，四設四與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

description.zh: 即使科學昌明如此，但我們日常生活中使用的、不斷推陳出新的照相機、攝錄影機、影印機等，在在都說明幾何光學現在仍然是主宰設計的工具。光學主要是藉著對光本質方面的瞭解，發展有關的理論基礎與計算法則，並進而用在日常生活且增益人類福祉的一門科學。幾何光學則是光學理論中，一連串近似運算的結果，著重在成像的效果和應用的一門工具性知識。本系之幾何光學是一學期、三學分、每週三小時的課程，教學內容大致包含以下三部份：一、介紹光的性質、在介面上反射、折射之有關定理、成像的原因及應用。二、分析像差現象及其成因與評估。三、淺介透鏡之設計。
description.en: Light is the principal means by which we gain knowledge of the world. From putting continually the improved camera, video cassette recorder, copying machine, etc., to market can just account for how important a designing tool the Geometric-Optics is.To build a solid basic theory and a rule for calculating through understanding thoroughly the nature of light is the central goal of Optics. Using the basic theory of optics and processes of approximate estimate, the Geometric-Optics put its point on image formation and its applications.Here in our department, the Geometric-Optics is a 3-credit, 3-hour per week, one-semester course. There are three consecutives parts in the one-semester lecture:The 1st part : (a)the nature of light, (b)the related theorems about reflection and refraction, (c) image formation.The 2nd part : the formation and correctness of aberrations.The 3rd part : the designing of lenses.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程其內容包括：1. 地球環境變遷對環境控制系統之衝擊2. 空調設備系統3. 特殊空調節能設備4. 電氣設備系統5. 設施管理6.設備更新 7. 建築防火避難與消防設備8. 給排水衛生化糞設備9. 升降機設備系統10. 智慧型建築概論11. 垃圾處理設備12.物理環境衝擊影響評估與對策。
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is content including:1. The Impact of Earth Environmental Change to Environmental Control System, 2. Air Conditional Equipment System, 3. Special Air Conditional Energy Conservation System, 4. Electric equipment, 5. Facility Management, 6. Renewal of Equipment System, 7. Architecture Fire Safety. Fire Escape and Fire Fighting Equipment , 8. Plumbing Equipment , 9. Elevator Equipment, 10. Introduction about Intelligent Building, 11. Refuse Treatment Equipment, 12. Physical Environmental Impact Assessment and Resolution.

description.zh: 以傳播廣宣的理論為基礎，了解廣告相關理論，並能夠實際應用廣告學相關理論。
description.en: This course including the theories of advertisement, and the application of advertisement.

description.zh: 幫助同學了解投資的理論與實務發展,訓練分析能力與培養正確投資觀念：投資學基礎、固定收益證券、權益證券、投資組合分析與管理、衍生性金融商品與風險管理
description.en: To introduce the developments of investment theories and practice to the students and try to enhance their analysis ability. ＊concepts of investment＊fixed-income securities＊equity securities＊portfolio theory and analysis＊financial derivatives and risk management

notes: 限40人,四管三與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程主要探討服務行銷的重要內容，包括顧客行為、關係行銷、行銷策略設計與服務品質模式探討及顧客滿意度研究。課程將配合實例進行討論。
description.en: This course is to discuss some important topics of service marketing:  Consumer Behavior, Relationship Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Service Quality Model and Customer Satisfaction.  The course  contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in service marketing practice.

description.zh: RFID技術標準，RFID市場與應用趨勢，RFID資訊系統與管理，RFID系統發展與應用，RFID資訊倫理與隱私，其他。
description.en: Protocols and standards of RFID, RFID markets and application trends, informative management system of RFID, RFID system development and applications, RFID informational ethics and privacy, others.

description.zh:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）
2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 大三上特教生(限領有聽障手冊生),資源教室

description.zh:
中文課程共分四年三階段授課。
第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。
第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。
第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
description.en:
The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. 
In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language.
In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. 
In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.

description.zh: 緒論、物質和原子學說、礦物和岩石、火成岩和岩漿活動、沉積岩和沉積作用、變質岩和變質作用、風化和土壤、火山作用、地質時間、塊體運動、河流、地下水、沙漠和風的作用、冰川和冰川作用、海洋、海岸之地質作用、地震、地球之內部、地殼變動、大陸和山脈、能源和能源礦產、地球之資源、板塊構造學說、地球和太陽系等。
description.en: Geology is a study of the planet Earth. It is concered with the origin of the planet, the material and morphology of the Earth, and its history and present forms. Contents include : science and the world we live in, a view of the earth, the dynamic earth, materials of the earth's crust (atom and minerals), igneous rocks (volcanic and plutonic), sedimentary rocks, pages of earth history, tectonic features (folds and faults), life as a fuel maker (coal and oil), salt domes, metamorphism and metamorphic rocks, igneous intrusions, volcanoes and their products, dating and pages of earth history, rock weathering and soils, surface erosion and landscape slopes, the work of rivers, development of river systems and associated landscapes, underground water, glaciers and glaciation, ice ages and climate change, wind action and desert landscapes, coastal scenery and the work of the sea, marine sediments and the ocean floor, earthquakes etc..

description.zh: 本課程在介紹及闡述化學原理及物質之性質，著重於現代化學理論及概念之導入。內容包括氣體、計量化學、原子結構、化學鍵、物質狀態、能量轉換、酸鹼理論、氧化還原反應、金屬及非金屬元素。
description.en: Fundamentals of structure and properties of carbon compounds. Emphasis on reaction mechanisms, synthesis, stereochemistry, as well as chemical and spectroscopic methods of analysis.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidify the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetic, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters, and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本科目旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1.計算機系統簡介 2 .資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯3.周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計5. 軟體工程與系統開發工具6.資料結構與演算法 7.作業系統 8.檔案與資料庫 9.資料通訊與計算機網路10.人工智慧
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the fundamentals and applications of computers. The major topics covered in this course are: 1.Introduction to computer systems 2.Data representation, number systems, and logic 3.Peripherals and storage 4. Programming languages and programming 5. Data structures and algorithms 6. Software engineering and system development tools 7. Operating systems 8.File and database systems 9. Data communication and computer networks .10. Emerging techniques.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: n
description.en: n

notes: 自然選修,北大同步遠距,王從恕老師,

name.en: Introduction and Laboratory of GMP for biotech products

description.zh: 新興生技產品的生產製造過程，絕大部分都受到不同的GMP規範，而這些GMP規範又有別於機械，電子，化工產品的GMP規範，這也是台灣生技廠的業者迫切希望學校能教授的專業課目之一。由於生技產品GMP是跟著個別產品量身訂做的，因此本課程將選定一產品，然後依序從GMP法規的概述與要求，生技GMP品質系統，標準製造流程的建立，生產流程與GMP文件之建構，到最後的實習操作與實地GMP廠查核。
description.en: Most of the newly emerged biotech products must follow their GMP guidance, which is different from the GMP in mechanical, electronic, and chemical engineering products. According to the GMP guidance is depend on the biotechnical products, this course will teach and train students the following topics: the general introduction and the requests of GMP guidance, the system of quality requirement, the establishment of standard operation protocol, the establishment of documents and how to fill in it, and the practical training and the factory auditing.

notes: 四化四甲乙丙及最後一哩合開,限24人

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

name.zh: 英文輔導課程-英語聽講(一)

description.zh: 本課程著重於基本聽力與口說練習，內容包含基本發音練習，介紹一般日用問答句型，並引導學生表達基本對談且配合溝通技巧的應用如日用會話、基本慣用語等。本課程的規劃著，個人發音與重互動式溝通練習如兩人(或多人)一組或師生一對一的主題演練及討論，在課堂上模擬在生活中常見的情境，藉此引導學生實際利用所學的語言內容，並結合個人經驗進行英語的基本溝通。
description.en: This course focuses on basic oral and listening skills. The contents of the course include basic pronunciation practice, basic question-and-answer response practice, and basic daily communication skills practice, such as short conversations and colloquial usage. In-class practice will be carried out based on individual pronunciation practice or interactive communication mode where students will work in pairs, groups, or with the teacher individually. There will also be simulated scenarios where the students can incorporate what they’ve learnt in class in order to gain language experience and improve their oral proficiency.

name.zh: 英文輔導課程-字彙與閱讀(二)

description.zh:
這個課程主要幫助英語初級程度的大二學生培養其閱讀與字彙技巧, 主要增強學習者對於周遭生活環境的英文理解力. 藉由接觸廣泛跨文化領域的議題, 學生可以了解不同文化背景的人們對於各種事物的看法與態度. 課程設計架構如下:
1.大量拓展學生的英文字彙與片語數量
2.藉由閱讀各類型文章, 正確了解內容要義, 增進獨立思考及邏輯分析能力
3.課程活動以文章內容搭配PPT詳細解說, 個人或分組討論, 以提供學生不同的閱讀技巧與策略, 進而增加閱讀速度
4.培養學生欣賞英文文章的能力並增進廣泛閱讀的樂趣
description.en:
This course aims to help the learners at elementary level develop reading and vocabulary skills that could enhance their comprehension of daily life environment in English. The framework of this course is designed as follows:
This course aims to help sophomore learners at elementary level develop reading and vocabulary skills that could enhance their comprehension of daily life environment in English. Students are given a wide variety of articles based on cross-cultural topics in order to appreciate diverse perspectives of people from different cultural backgrounds. The framework of this course is designed as follows:
1.The course helps students to enlarge their vocabulary repertoire
2.Through reading articles of different genres, students will not only read more efficiently but also improve their critical thinking and analytical abilities.
3.The course activities include lectures along with PPT demonstrations and individual and/or group discussions in an attempt to provide students wi

name.zh: 英文輔導課程-英語聽講(二)

description.zh: 本課程著重於進階聽力與口說練習，內容包含進階發音練習如混和音、不發音、連音、略音等，介紹一般日用問答句型，並引導學生表達基本對談且配合溝通技巧的應用如日用會話、基本慣用語等。本課程的規劃著，個人發音與重互動式溝通練習如兩人(或多人)一組或師生一對一的主題演練及討論，在課堂上模擬在生活中常見的情境，藉此引導學生實際利用所學的語言內容，並結合個人經驗進行英語的基本溝通。
description.en: This course focuses on advanced oral and listening skills. The contents of the course include advanced pronunciation practice, advanced question-and-answer response practice, and advanced daily communication skills practice, such as long conversations and colloquial usage. In-class practice will be carried out based on individual pronunciation practice or interactive communication mode where students will work in pairs, groups, or with the teacher individually. There will also be simulated scenarios where the students can incorporate what they’ve learnt in class in order to gain language experience and improve their oral proficiency.

name.zh: 英文輔導課程-文法與寫作(一)

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹如何加強英文基礎文法修辭，以及學習短段落寫作的常見文體；讓學生熟稔運用基本文法，以正確且清晰地表達其構思。
description.en: This course is intended to provide an overview of basic English grammar. The grammatical concepts taught in this course are used as a background for students to construct sentences and short paragraphs that convey ideas effectively and clearly.

name.zh: 英文輔導課程-文法與寫作(二)

description.zh: 本課承續大一文法寫作的文法基礎，介紹如何擴增英文句子，以及學習篇章寫作；讓學生熟稔和活運英文文法，以正確且清晰地表達其構思。
description.en: This course is based the basic grammar knowledge taught in Grammar and Writing in freshman year. The grammatical concepts taught in this course provide students with tools to expand English sentences and compose paragraphs and short essays.

name.zh: 英文輔導課程-字彙與閱讀(一)

description.zh:
這個課程主要幫助英語初級程度的學生培養其閱讀與字彙技巧, 主要增強學習者對於周遭生活環境的英文理解力. 課程設計架構如下:
1.授課講師提供密集且廣泛之字彙與閱讀能力
2.授課講師自編上課講義涵蓋廣泛的實用主題
3.此課程主要協助學生透過各種活種增進字彙與閱讀技巧
4.此課程主要協助學生增強文法概念以及提升其閱讀速度和閱讀理解力
5.課堂練習主要協助學生運用有效的閱讀技巧
6.課堂上個別練習的設計主要是協助學生培養深度的思考技巧
課堂討論和分組練習的設計主要是協助學生能自信地自我表達以及尊重不同觀點
description.en:
This course aims to help the learners at elementary level develop reading and vocabulary skills that could enhance their comprehension of daily life environment in English. The framework of this course is designed as follows:
1.The course instructor offers intensive and extensive approaches to vocabulary and reading. 
2.The textbook is edited and compiled by the course instructor in order to provide a wide range of engaging topics for practical use. 
3.This course aims to help students build up vocabulary and reading skills with a full range of activities. 
4.This course is designed to help students enhance grammar knowledge and improve reading speed as well as reading comprehension. 
5.The in-class activities will help students read with purpose by using effective reading strategies. 
6.Individual practice is designed to help students develop in-depth thinking skills. 
Classroom discussion and pair and/or group work are designed to help each student express oneself confidently and res

name.zh: 職場達人-自傳履歷與面試實務
name.en: Skills of biography and interview for successful workplaces

description.zh: 常聽到學生或家長說，應屆畢業學生未檢視畢業條件，因不符合畢業門檻致延畢事件，本堂課特從提醒學生「畢業準備好了沒」，如何撰寫中英文自傳與履歷、以中英文自我介紹、到由業界主管與學生現場或透過網路以中英文面試等，希望透過這些課程設計,協助學生總結學校所學課程並加以整理，提升就業準備能力。
description.en: This lesson begins to remind students of "Are you ready to graduate？", and then how to write Chinese and English autobiography and resume, self-introduction with Chinese and English, at the end is the interview by  director of industry in the class or through internet. Hope that through the course designed to help students to summarize and organize what they have learned from school in order to enhance their ability of employment preparation.

notes: 四子四甲乙.電通所和最後一哩合開

name.zh: 全電化都會運輸系統基礎技術
name.en: Fundamental technology to fully electrified metropolitan transportation systems

description.zh: 本課程的授課目標為培育新一代工程師在全電化都會運輸系統上所需要之基礎技術。課程將介紹整車動態模擬分析、馬達驅動技術與關鍵零組件、電力轉換系統設計、系統整合等，使學生了解、學習全電化都會運輸系統基本知識並能落實應用基礎技術。
description.en: This course aims to train students to gain the fundamental technology of fully electrified metropolitan transportation systems. The course contents include real-time dynamic simulation for electric vehicles, motor drive technology and its key components, electric power conversion, and system integration. Through the classes, students will learn the key knowledge and apply the basic technology to the electrified metropolitan transportation system.

notes: 四車三、四和最後一哩合開

name.en: Environmental Ethics and Ethics for Architects

description.zh: 本課程的主要目標是期待學生不再單純把建築視為一個經濟的或美學的問題。鑒於這個領域對人造以及自然環境的巨大影響，所有問題都應同時由道德上的對與錯這個角度來進行審視。本學期的進度將由環境倫理學的議題所構成，並分為以下三大部分：一、基本概念，二、作為應用倫理學的環境倫理學，三、環境倫理學理論。這門課同時希望協助同學處理未來會在職場上遇到的倫理困境並提高其責任感。課堂上將固定地提出建築師一般會在實務中遇到的各類道德兩難，並讓同學討論。案例取自五個範疇：一、基本責任，二、公共責任，三、對客戶的責任，四、職業道德，五、對同事的責任。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to keep students from thinking architecture solely as an economic or aesthetic problem. Given the fact that this discipline exercises huge impacts on lives as well as built and natural environments, each question must be examined in terms of what is morally right or wrong at the same time. The progression of this semester will be structured by topics in environmental ethics and divided into three parts: A. Basic concepts, B. Environmental ethics as applied ethics, and C. Theories of environmental ethics. Meanwhile, different moral dilemmas architects encounter generally in professional practice will be regularly proposed and discussed in class, to prepare students for ethical difficulties they will come across at work and enhance their sense of responsibility.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師涂菀凌,北大三峽校區商學院1F01博雅選修文學

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師辛法春,北大三峽校區商學院1F09,博雅選修文學

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師林佳靜,醫大2202教室,博雅選修哲學

name.zh: 歐洲聯盟：跨國法律與政策

description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

notes: 教師陳瑞玲,醫大8005教室博雅選修文學B班

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師林文琪,醫大美學教室,博雅選修哲學A班

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師張清泉,醫大8005教室博雅選修文學

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 彭立忠老師,醫大8006教室,博雅選修歷史

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

notes: 本門課程為101學年度暑期校外實習，同學請勿自行選課

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師王冠生,北大三峽校區公學院1F15博雅選修哲學

notes: 教師王冠生,北大三峽校區社科學院1F06博雅選修哲學

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師劉寧慧,北大三峽校區文學院2F01,博雅選修文學

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而?化社會適應能力。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

notes: 教師林定香,北大三峽校區商學院7F02博雅選修社會

description.zh:
Design Thinking是一個創意與設計的方法，根據各種設計主題之特性尋求解決方案，創造更多的可能性。
本課程為輔導學生在設計作品的操作過程中，導入情境故事的創新發想、腦力激盪、設計構思、實作執行等步驟，形塑出整合且具體之執行方案，進而催生設計成品從課堂進入到市場，創造品牌價值。
description.en: Design thinking is a methodology for practical, creative resolution of problems or issues that looks for an improved future result. Through experiential learning, class discussion and co-review, students will learn how to perform innovative design-oriented research and make connections between methodology for stimulating creativity, generating solutions and optimizing projects.

notes: 設計學院大三大四合開課程,限20人

description.zh: Design Thinking是一個創意與設計的方法，根據各種設計主題之特性尋求解決方案，創造更多的可能性。本課程為輔導學生在建築設計的操作過程中，導入互動式的創新發想、腦力激盪、設計構思、實作執行等步驟，形塑出整合且具體之執行方案，養成具備競賽實力與實務接軌能力的設計師。
description.en: The course looks at principles of design and ways of thinking leading to ideas and creative solutions. Through experiential learning, class discussion and lectures, students are expected to learn and practice problem solving and acquire designing skills - to explore, empathize, synthesize, ideate, prototype and implement.

notes: 設計學院大四與研究所合開課程,限50人

description.zh: Design Thinking是一個創意與設計的方法，根據各種設計主題之特性尋求解決方案，創造更多的可能性。本課程為輔導學生在建築設計的操作過程中，研究關於空間問題的分析、需求定義的描述、概念的發想與獲取、設計策略的擬定，直至具體方案的成形、優化與執行。
description.en: Through experiential learning, class discussion and co-review, students will learn how to perform innovative design-oriented research and make connections between methodology for stimulating creativity, generating solutions and optimizing projects.

notes: 設計學院大四合開課程

description.zh: 本課程研究形態生成理論以及實務演練其程序，以做為一種設計思考的新模式。課程中將進行設計形體的生長、變化、回應、演化、調適，並以此方法重新檢視建築空間設計之幾何向度，提升設計方案之競爭力。
description.en: The course researches and develops morphogenetic processes as a way of new design thinking, in which systems of complex geometries that grow, morph, react, evolve, and adapt to conditions are analyzed and generated digitally and materially.

notes: 設計學院大四合開課程

description.zh: 引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。
description.en: This course is concerned with how speakers organize what they want to say in accordance with who they are talking to, where, when, and under what circumstances. It offers a broad overview of the concepts and tools that are required for analyzing how linguistic communication works.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用暑假至電機相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation is carried out in one of the corporative electrical engineering company during summer vocation. The students practice and learn the real operation of the electrical engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 介紹產品開發的流程與工作的內容，運用產學合作模式，輔導學生實際參與和體驗產業界之產品開發專案，訓練學生團隊合作與問題解決能力。
description.en: Introduce Product develop process and C-flow , guide and help students ' active ,training their team work capability , independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 介紹產品開發的流程與工作的內容，運用產學合作模式，輔導學生實際參與和體驗產業界之產品開發專案，訓練學生團隊合作與問題解決能力。
description.en: Introduce Product develop process and C-flow , guide and help students ' active ,training their team work capability , independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

notes: 暑期校外實習，同學請勿自行選課。

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學年至材料及資源工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生每學期必須撰寫實習心得報告以便評分。
description.en: The course is developed to enhance the on-job practical capability of students. Students are trained for an academic year in corporative company or organizations of materials and Mineral Resources Engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to meet the course requirement for each semester.

description.zh:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）
2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

name.zh: 輸送現象與單元操作(二)

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至電子工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the electronic engineering related fields in one of the corporative electronic engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative electronic engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至化學工程與生物科技相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the chemical engineering and biotechnology related fields in one of the corporative chemical engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative chemical engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。

The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，規定學生必須利用暑假至化工相關機構實習，參與校外合作廠商所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，於次一學期註冊後，再由指導教師依據學生之心得報告，加以檢核、指導撰寫成實習成果報告，彙交系上保存，可供其他同學參考。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative chemical engineering company during summer vocation , practice and learn the real operation of the chemical engineering related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
